Class ec.cosm.costume.AnimationProgram 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.AnimationProgram
public class AnimationProgram
extends Object
implements RtCodeable
AnimationProgram specifies a choreographed set of animations, sounds, and rotations. AnimationPrograms are used by Gestures, and may also be invoked directly from code, for example when an avatar picks something up.

AnimationProgram()
Returns a new AnimationProgram with one animation track.

classNameToEncode(RtEncoder)
decode(RtDecoder)
encode(RtEncoder)
getAnimationTrackAt(int)
Returns the ProgramTrack representing animation track number trackIndex.
getDuration()
Returns the total time in milliseconds required for the animation program by finding the length of the longest track.
getNumberOfAnimationTracks()
Returns the number of concurrent animation tracks.
getRotationTrack()
Returns the orientation track
getSoundTrack()
Returns the sound track
setNumberOfAnimationTracks(int)
Sets the number of concurrent animation tracks.

AnimationProgram 
  public AnimationProgram()
Returns a new AnimationProgram with one animation track.

getNumberOfAnimationTracks 
  public int getNumberOfAnimationTracks()
Returns the number of concurrent animation tracks.
setNumberOfAnimationTracks 
  public void setNumberOfAnimationTracks(int newNumber)
Sets the number of concurrent animation tracks. If the new number is smaller than the old number, the extra tracks are forgotten.
getAnimationTrackAt 
  public ProgramTrack getAnimationTrackAt(int trackIndex)
Returns the ProgramTrack representing animation track number trackIndex.
